Ingredient:ingredient_bacon.Name: Ingredient_Bacon
Ingredient:ingredient_bacon.ItemDescription: Crafting Ingredient. The duct tape of food! Can be found in unique places throughout the world. Crafty farmers have even developed a method of growing it in their fields, in place of... everything.

Ingredient:ingredient_batteries.Name: Ingredient_Batteries
Ingredient:ingredient_batteries.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used as a component for powered devices. Found in populated areas and appliances.

Ingredient:ingredient_blastpowder.Name: Ingredient_Blastpowder
Ingredient:ingredient_blastpowder.ItemDescription: Refined crafting ingredient. Used as a base for many gadgets and explosive ammunitions. Made from coal.

Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_moonglow.Name: Ingredient_Crystal_Moonglow
Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_moonglow.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Occasionally found in caves and mountains.

Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_quartz.Name: Ingredient_Crystal_Quartz
Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_quartz.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Occasionally found in caves and mountains.

Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_rainbow.Name: Ingredient_Crystal_Rainbow
Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_rainbow.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Occasionally found in caves and mountains.

Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_shadowshar.Name: Ingredient_Crystal_ShadowShard
Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_shadowshar.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Occasionally found in caves and mountains. Common in Twine Peaks and rare in high end Canny Valley.

Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_sunbeam.Name: Ingredient_Crystal_Sunbeam
Ingredient:ingredient_crystal_sunbeam.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Occasionally found in caves and mountains. Rare in high end Twine Peaks.

Ingredient:ingredient_duct_tape.Name: Ingredient_Duct_Tape
Ingredient:ingredient_duct_tape.ItemDescription: Refined crafting ingredient. Can be made with other ingredients, and commonly found in chests.

Ingredient:ingredient_flowers.Name: Ingredient_Flowers
Ingredient:ingredient_flowers.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used as a base for crafting healing items. Found in plants and bushes.

Ingredient:ingredient_herbs.Name: Ingredient_Herbs
Ingredient:ingredient_herbs.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient used for healing stations and duct tape. Found by searching bushes, crops and food storage areas.

Ingredient:ingredient_honey.Name: Ingredient_Honey
Ingredient:ingredient_honey.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by destroying beehives and searching crops.

Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.Name: Ingredient_Mechanical_Parts_T01
Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found in toolboxes, crates and by destroying mechanical objects.

Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.Name: Ingredient_Mechanical_Parts_T02
Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found in toolboxes, crates and by destroying mechanical objects.

Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.Name: Ingredient_Mechanical_Parts_T03
Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found in toolboxes, crates and by destroying mechanical objects.

Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.Name: Ingredient_Mechanical_Parts_T04
Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found in toolboxes, crates and by destroying mechanical objects.

Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.Name: Ingredient_Mechanical_Parts_T05
Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found in toolboxes, crates and by destroying mechanical objects.

Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.Name: Ingredient_Mechanical_Parts_T06
Ingredient:ingredient_mechanical_parts_t.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found in toolboxes, crates and by destroying mechanical objects.

Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomblue.Name: Ingredient_MushroomBlue
Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomblue.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make consumable items with energizing properties. Found in caves.

Ingredient:ingredient_mushroompink.Name: Ingredient_MushroomPink
Ingredient:ingredient_mushroompink.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make consumable buffs. Found growing on trees and walls.

Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomred.Name: Ingredient_MushroomRed
Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomred.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used in consumables with healing and strengthening properties. Found in forests.

Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomwhite.Name: Ingredient_MushroomWhite
Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomwhite.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to enhance the strength of consumable items. Found in mountains.

Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomyellow.Name: Ingredient_MushroomYellow
Ingredient:ingredient_mushroomyellow.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Valued for its varied properties when combined with other ingredients. Found growing on the ground.

Ingredient:ingredient_nuts_bolts.Name: Ingredient_Nuts_Bolts
Ingredient:ingredient_nuts_bolts.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found in toolboxes, crates and by destroying mechanical objects.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_alloy.Name: Ingredient_Ore_Alloy
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_alloy.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used in many common items and traps. Found by destroying rocks.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_brightcore.Name: Ingredient_Ore_BrightCore
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_brightcore.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Found in caves, mountains and occasionally in containers in settled areas. Rare in high end Twine Peaks.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_coal.Name: Ingredient_Ore_Coal
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_coal.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used as a base for explosive ammo and many weapons. Found in caves, mountains and fireplaces.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_copper.Name: Ingredient_Ore_Copper
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_copper.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Found in caves, mountains and occasionally in containers in settled areas. It is said that the one who controls the copper controls the world.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_malachite.Name: Ingredient_Ore_Malachite
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_malachite.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Found in caves, mountains and occasionally in containers in settled areas. Common in Canny Valley and rare in high end Plankerton.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_obsidian.Name: Ingredient_Ore_Obsidian
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_obsidian.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Found in caves, mountains and occasionally in containers in settled areas. Common in Twine Peaks and rare in high end Canny Valley.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_silver.Name: Ingredient_Ore_Silver
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_silver.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Found in caves, mountains and occasionally in containers in settled areas. Common in Plankerton and rare in high end Stonewood.

Ingredient:ingredient_ore_spectrolite.Name: Ingredient_Ore_Spectrolite
Ingredient:ingredient_ore_spectrolite.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Used to make many quality weapons. Found in caves, mountains and occasionally in containers in settled areas.

Ingredient:ingredient_planks.Name: Ingredient_Planks
Ingredient:ingredient_planks.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by destroying trees.

Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t01.Name: Ingredient_Powder_T01
Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t01.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by destroying rocks.

Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t02.Name: Ingredient_Powder_T02
Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t02.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by destroying rocks.

Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t04.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by destroying rocks.

Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t05.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by destroying rocks.

Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t06.Name: Ingredient_Powder_T06
Ingredient:ingredient_powder_t06.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by destroying rocks.

Ingredient:ingredient_rare_mechanism.Name: Ingredient_Rare_Mechanism
Ingredient:ingredient_rare_mechanism.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Occasionally found in chests and toolboxes.

Ingredient:ingredient_rare_powercell.Name: Ingredient_Rare_PowerCell
Ingredient:ingredient_rare_powercell.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Rarely found in strange places and chests.

Ingredient:ingredient_resin.Name: Ingredient_Resin
Ingredient:ingredient_resin.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Found by chopping down trees and searching bushes.

Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t01.Name: Ingredient_Twine_T01
Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t01.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Can be found by destroying trees.

Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t02.Name: Ingredient_Twine_T02
Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t02.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Can be found by destroying trees.

Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t03.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Can be found by destroying trees.

Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t04.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Can be found by destroying trees.

Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t05.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Can be found by destroying trees.

Ingredient:ingredient_twine_t06.ItemDescription: Crafting ingredient. Can be found by destroying trees.
